present.english: I am familiar with the big city
The foreign tourist is familiar with the famous place
The new guests are familiar with the quiet neighborhood

imperfect.english: I was familiar with the big city
The foreign tourist was familiar with the famous place
The new guests were familiar with the quiet neighborhood

future.english: I will be familiar with the big city
The foreign tourist will be familiar with the famous place
The new guests will be familiar with the quiet neighborhood

aorist.english: I was familiar with the big city
The foreign tourist was familiar with the famous place
The new guests were familiar with the quiet neighborhood

optative.english: I should be familiar with the big city

optative.georgian: უცხო ტურისტმა ცნობილი ადგილი უნდა გაიცნოს
optative.english: The foreign tourist should be familiar with the famous place

optative.english: The new guests should be familiar with the quiet neighborhood

imperative.english: You, be familiar with the local building
